Package dbDAO

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CompanyDAO
    this interface class is designed to bound the implements class to apply the following method.
    CouponDAO
    this interface class is designed to bound the implements class to apply the following method.
    CustomerDAO
    this interface class is designed to bound the implements class to apply the following method.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseDB<T>
    This class is assigned to extract companies,coupons or customers from the DB this is an abstract class which has 2 methods for connect and return one abstract method and one execute method it similar works as a template method.
    BaseHeir
    This class is extends BaseDB it designed for functions that the BaseDB cannot provide such as work with a static method.
    CompanyDBDAO
    The class Company is the class that do all the required access work with DB using the methods below.
    CompList<T>
    This class extends BaseDB and has only one Override method that returning a company ArrayList from the DB.
    ConnectionPool
    This is the class which provide connection to the DB and also close all the connection.
    CoupList<T>
    This class is extends BaseDB and has only one method and it's assignment is to provide coupons ArrayList to all comers.
    CouponDBDAO
    this class dbDAO is the class that works with the Data Base in all issues creation and removing updating and so of the coupons options following the methods.
    Creator
    The class of Creator is designed to create a new CouponProgect member can be a Coupon ,Company or customer it has too static method the first is for checking if the member is exist and the second is to set it in the DB.
    CustList<T>  
    CustomerDBDAO
    The class CustomerDBDAO is the class that do all the required access work with DB using the methods below.
    DailyCouponExpirationTask
    This is a Thread implements Runnable It's a thread that once a day going through all the last dates of all the coupons in the DB and delete the expired one from the DB.
    SqlExecute
    The role of this class is to execute queries for this coupon project.
    SqlQueries
    This class introductory all the SQL queries on this "CouponProject" project they are all final static Strings to easy access and unable to be Override
